Posts.Content: For the first time today I have cried my eyes out.  My neutrophils have stayed stubbonly at 0.00 since first chemo so now I find out I need some sort of bone marrow injection for the second round.  Combined with an abscess in my other breast that was aspirated today.  My breast consultant tells me I cannot have next round of chemo because of the abscess.  Somebody stopped me in the street yesterday and said Oh what have you done to your hair it was so beautiful.  My 5 year old  spends more time with Granny than me and I have had enough ......
Posts.Title: Feel like I have had enough

Posts.Content: LOL are we sharing golf balls - inside of mouth started peeling off today, feels like a pencil sharpener went through mouth.  I got my bandanas from that site too, thinking about just putting em on now and clipping off - sick of waiting for it to happen !! XX good luck XX
Posts.Title: Problems after 1st TC infusion

Posts.Content: Thanks for that - I also cannot wait for it to go.  I have a wig but think I prefer my bandanas, beanies and scarves (I got a selection!!).  I had hair cut short in preparation.  Itching has eased a little - to be replaced by the thick tongue and golf ball throat .....
Posts.Title: Problems after 1st TC infusion

Posts.Content: Not sure if I am imagining stuff but I was under impression that my hair would last a couple of weeks after 1st chemo session, however just 1 day after my first session my scalp is itching like mad - apart from feeling flushed I have not had any other side effects.  Is it my rampant imagination (or have I got nits LOL ) anyone else had this - I could honestly scratch it all out tonight XX
Posts.Title: Problems after 1st TC infusion
